BR.name: AiRace Speed
BR.description: Seu Nintendo 3DS™ vai descobrir o verdadeiro significado de velocidade e adrenalina com AiRace Speed. Aceite o desafio e pilote os jatos mais avançados e poderosos competindo para fazer o melhor tempo. Corra em maravilhosas pistas de alta velocidade com túneis diabolicamente difíceis, salões espetacular e atalhos escondidos. Leve a velocidade a outro nível e aproveite uma nova experiência de jogo frenética que inclui: Aceite o desafio - voe a velocidades extremas por 18 pistas abastecidas de adrenalina Ambientes maravilhosos cheios de obstáculos desafiadores, túneis, atalhos e muito mais Controle um de 5 jatos futuristas de alta velocidade com tecnologia avançada Gráficos de alta performance e efeitos 3D imersivos que colocam você no meio da ação Compita contra outros competidores ao redor do mundo em placares online Fator de replay fantástico com conquistas especiais para serem desbloqueadas Terceiro jogo da série de sucesso e bem avaliada, AiRace

CA.name: AiRace Speed
CA.description: Let your Nintendo 3DS™ discover the true meaning of speed and adrenaline with AiRace Speed. Take the challenge and pilot the most advanced and powerful jets as you compete to beat your best time. Race on stunning high-speed tracks featuring extremely difficult tunnels, spectacular halls and hidden shortcuts. Take speed to a whole new level and enjoy a frantic new gaming experience: Take the challenge - fly extreme speeds across 18 adrenaline-fueled tracks Stunning environments packed with challenging obstacles, tunnels, shortcuts and more Take control of one of 5 high-speed, futuristic jets powered with advanced technology High-performance graphics and immersive 3D effects that put you in the middle of the action Compete against fellow competitors around the world in online leaderboards Fantastic replay value with special achievements to be unlocked Third game of the successful and highly rated AiRace series

MX.name: AiRace Speed
MX.description: Deja que tu Nintendo 3DS™ descubra el verdadero significado de la velocidad y la adrenalina con AiRace Speed. Acepta el reto y pilota los aviones más avanzados mientras intentas batir tu mejor tiempo. Corre en pistas sorprendentes con túneles endiabladamente difíciles, pasillos espectaculares y atajos escondidos. Gana velocidad y disfruta de una nueva experiencia de juego que incluye: Acepta el reto: vuela a velocidad extrema en 18 pistas llenas de adrenalina. Entornos increíbles plagados de obstáculos, túneles, atajos y mucho más. Toma el control de 5 aviones futuristas de alta velocidad que incorporan la última tecnología. Fantásticos gráficos y efectos 3D que te colocan en el centro de la acción. Compite contra otros jugadores de todo el mundo en las clasificaciones online. Gran rejugabilidad con logros especiales que puedes desbloquear. El tercer juego de la exitosa serie AiRace.

Take the challenge and pilot the most advanced and powerful jets as you compete to beat your best time. Race on stunning high-speed tracks featuring extremely difficult tunnels, spectacular halls and hidden shortcuts. Take speed to a whole new level and enjoy a frantic new gaming experience: Take the challenge - fly extreme speeds across 18 adrenaline-fueled tracks Stunning environments packed with challenging obstacles, tunnels, shortcuts and more Take control of one of 5 high-speed, futuristic jets powered with advanced technology High-performance graphics and immersive 3D effects that put you in the middle of the action Compete against fellow competitors around the world in online leaderboards Fantastic replay value with special achievements to be unlocked Third game of the successful and highly rated AiRace series
